languages.text: "Ториана Гапрак, член вашего дома организовал покушение на меня — здесь, в моем собственном дворце. И хоть он был найден мертвым, его поступка при жизни достаточно, чтобы навсегда поставить клеймо предателей на вашем доме".

traits.locale_text: "Член вашего дома, Гален Гапрак организовал покушение на Вольного Торговца — здесь, в моем дворце. И хоть он был найден мертвым, его поступка при жизни достаточно, чтобы навсегда поставить клеймо предателей на вашем доме".

languages.text: "Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt against me — here, in my own palace. And though he has already been found dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."
languages.original_text: "Ториана Гапрак, член вашего дома организовал покушение на меня — здесь, в моем собственном дворце. И хоть он был найден мертвым, его поступка при жизни достаточно, чтобы навсегда поставить клеймо предателей на вашем доме".

traits.locale_text: "Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family had organised an attack on me — here, in my own house. And while he is already dead, his deed is enough to forever brand your house as traitors."
"Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family had organised an attack on me — here, in my own house. And while he is already dead, his deed is enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

"Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt on my life—here, in my own palace. And while he is already dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

"Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt on my life—here, in my own palace. And while he is already dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

"Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt against me — here, in my own palace. And though he has already been found dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

"Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt against me — here, in my own palace. And though he has already been found dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

languages.text: 「トリアーナ・ギャプラック、お前の家の人間が、私の暗殺未遂を画策していた…ここ、私の宮殿での暗殺だ。そして犯人はすでに死んだ。その行いは、お前の家名に裏切り者の名を永遠に刻む」
languages.original_text: "Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt against me — here, in my own palace. And though he has already been found dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

traits.locale_text: 「トリアーナ・ギャプラック、お前の家の人間が、私の暗殺未遂を画策していた…ここ、私の宮殿での暗殺だ。そして犯人はすでに死んだ。その行いは、お前の家名に裏切り者の名を永遠に刻む」

languages.text: “托丽安娜·贾帕克，你们家族有人策划了一场针对我的刺杀行动，就在这里，就在我自己的宫殿之中。尽管他已经死了，但他的所作所为，足以让你的家族永生永世被钉在叛徒的耻辱柱上。”
languages.original_text: "Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt against me — here, in my own palace. And though he has already been found dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

traits.locale_text: “托丽安娜·贾帕克，你们家族有人策划了一场针对我的刺杀行动，就在这里，就在我自己的宫殿之中。尽管他已经死了，但他的所作所为，足以让你的家族永生永世被钉在叛徒的耻辱柱上。”

languages.text: « Toriana Gaprak, un membre de votre famille a orchestré une tentative d'assassinat à mon encontre. Ici même, au sein de mon propre palais. Et bien qu'il soit déjà mort, ses agissements constituent un motif suffisant pour déclarer votre maison traîtresse à la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt against me — here, in my own palace. And though he has already been found dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

traits.locale_text: « Toriana Gaprak, un membre de votre famille a orchestré une tentative d'assassinat à mon encontre. Ici même, au sein de mon propre palais. Et bien qu'il soit déjà mort, ses agissements constituent un motif suffisant pour déclarer votre maison traîtresse à la dynastie. »

languages.text: «Toriana Gaprak, un miembro de su familia orquestó un atentado contra mi vida en mi propio palacio. Aunque ya esté muerto, su acto es razón suficiente como para tachar para siempre a su casa de traidora».
languages.original_text: "Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt against me — here, in my own palace. And though he has already been found dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

traits.locale_text: «Toriana Gaprak, un miembro de su familia orquestó un atentado contra mi vida en mi propio palacio. Aunque ya esté muerto, su acto es razón suficiente como para tachar para siempre a su casa de traidora».

languages.text: "Toriana Gaprak, ein Mitglied Eurer Familie, hat ein Attentat auf mich geplant. Hier, in meinem eigenen Palast. Und obwohl er bereits tot ist, reicht sein Verbrechen aus, um Euer Haus für immer als Verräter zu brandmarken."
languages.original_text: "Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt against me — here, in my own palace. And though he has already been found dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

traits.locale_text: "Toriana Gaprak, ein Mitglied Eurer Familie, hat ein Attentat auf mich geplant. Hier, in meinem eigenen Palast. Und auch wenn er bereits tot ist, sein Verbrechen reicht aus, um Euer Haus für immer als Verräter zu brandmarken."

languages.text: "Toriana Gaprak, hanenin bir mensubu kendi sarayımda bana yönelik bir suikast düzenledi. Bu şahsın cansız bedenine ulaşılsa da yaptıkları, hanenizi ebediyen hain olarak damgalamaya yeter."
languages.original_text: "Toriana Gaprak, a member of your family orchestrated an assassination attempt against me — here, in my own palace. And though he has already been found dead, his act is reason enough to forever brand your house as traitors."

traits.locale_text: "Toriana Gaprak, hanenin bir mensubu kendi sarayımda bana yönelik bir suikast düzenledi. Bu şahsın cansız bedenine ulaşılsa da yaptıkları, hanenizi ebediyen hain olarak damgalamaya yeter."
